channel.title: How to add new chat colour [ 317 - DELTA ]
channel.description:
This is both client and server sided , so I posted here because its more viewable than "client help" section.
Anyway , i was wondering how could i add a new color , for example: @pur@ ( meaning - purple )
There are many colours like @blu@ , @gre@ , @yel@ and so on.
How can i add this one?

item.title: How to add new chat colour [ 317 - DELTA ]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Thats a pile of shit.

Couldn’t understand a thing , and there was no files that any mopar server contains.

Thanks for your help though, I appreciate it.

Read full topic
